attributes.additional_details:
The good people of Britain request that this shocking decision made to charge a Royal Marines Commando for carrying out his duties in a conflict of war be reconsidered.

It is truly making a mockery of our Armed Forces who serve on the FRONTLINE day in/day out to protect the people of the UK ( which includes you, politicians)

Many people making and backing these decisions have not had any experience living and working in these environments, Free Marine 'A'!
